description: Add components to the content view (resource: PUT /katello/api/content_views/:composite_content_view_id/content_view_components/add)
name: content_views.content_view_components_add_components

components.description:
"description: Array of components to add
 parameters:
     content_view_id:
       required: false
       type: string
       description: content view identifier of the component who's latest version isdesired
     content_view_version_id:
       required: false
       type: string
       description: identifier of the version of the component content view
     latest:
       required: false
       type: string
       description: true if the latest version of the component's content view is desired
     "

connection.description: Name of <connection> from this pack's configuration that specifies how to connect to a server.

password.description: Optional override of the password in <connection>. (required if <connection> is not specified)

server.description: Optional override of the server in <connection> (required if <connection> is not specified).

username.description: Optional override of the username in <connection> (example: username@domain.tld) (required if <connection> is not specified).
